uio Class Reference

This class does user i/o - i.e. gui stuff This class replaces uiStuff. It contains similar functions, as well as pointers to commonly-referenced objects in qocc. There is no need to inherit from this class to be able to use it's functions, unlike uiStuff. However, it is necessary for the ctor to be called before using any of the functions in the class! More...

Detailed Description

This class does user i/o - i.e. gui stuff This class replaces uiStuff. It contains similar functions, as well as pointers to commonly-referenced objects in qocc. There is no need to inherit from this class to be able to use it's functions, unlike uiStuff. However, it is necessary for the ctor to be called before using any of the functions in the class!

uio creates and populates the Select menu.

TODO: add logging functionality from dr dobbs example
